**Problem 5**

Suppose that $X_1, \ldots, X_n$ form a random sample from the Bernoulli distribution with unknown probability of success $p$.

(a) Find the maximum likelihood estimate of $p$.
(b) Show that the estimate you found in part (a) attains the Cramer-Rao lower bound.
